Attempted to include a local file from the server by modifying the URL parameter, such as http://example.com/page?file=../../../../etc/passwd
Submitted the modified URL and the application displayed the contents of the /etc/passwd file, confirming the LFI vulnerability
Attempted to access other sensitive files on the server, such as configuration files or log files, that might contain valuable information
Explored various files and identified a sensitive file that contained the flag needed to complete the Web Exploitation challenge
Exploited the LFI vulnerability to access the sensitive file and obtain the flag needed to complete the challenge
